claim: The Silence of the Lambs was an unadapted novel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: When the novel was published in 1999 , The Silence of the Lambs director Jonathan Demme , screenwriter Ted Tally , and actress Jodie Foster all declined to be involved in its adaptation .
